text: @ShawnG927 @TWITMO_INMATE @ZyroFoxtrot @KarluskaP @RoseDC11 @pinkk9lover @ROCKONOHIO @RedPillMaC Funny how all these so called celebrities are getting CoVid19. Aren’t they staying at home on #LOCKDOWN2020 ? Are they just telling us to stay at home and then they are going out? Maybe they are just lying. @Madonna I don’t believe you have #Covid_19 at all. I think you’re lying
